verses.name: Acts 13:49
verses.text: And the word of the Lord was published throughout all the region.

verses.name: Acts 13:50
verses.text: But the Jews stirred up the devout and honourable women, and the chief men of the city, and raised persecution against Paul and Barnabas, and expelled them out of their coasts.

verses.name: Acts 13:51
verses.text: But they shook off the dust of their feet against them, and came unto Iconium.

verses.name: Acts 13:52
verses.text: And the disciples were filled with joy, and with the Holy Ghost.
